title: Lotto-Dstny, Israel-Premier Tech in Pole Position as Relegation-Promotion Tightens Up for 2025
content:
The two teams that were relegated in 2022 — Israel and Lotto — look to have a lock on promotion by end of 2025.

Read the full article at Lotto-Dstny, Israel-Premier Tech in Pole Position as Relegation-Promotion Tightens Up for 2025 on Velo.
author: ahood
